About this course

```{=html}
<div id="wolfram-sketch"></div>
<script>
new p5((p) => {
  let n = 10000;
  let x = [];
  let y = [];

  let t = 0;
  let dt = 0.02;

  p.setup = () => {
    let canvas = p.createCanvas(400, 400);
    canvas.parent("wolfram-sketch");
    for (let i = 0; i < n; i++) {
      x[i] = i + 1;
      y[i] = x[i] / 235.0;
    }
    p.stroke(0, 165);
    p.strokeWeight(1);
    p.background(255);
  };

  p.draw = () => {
    p.background(255);
    for (let i = 0; i < n; i++) {
      let k = (4 + 3 * p.sin(2 * y[i] - t)) * p.cos(x[i] / 29.0);
      let e = y[i] / 8.0 - 13.0;
      let d = p.sqrt(k * k + e * e);
      let c = d - t;

      let q = 3 * p.sin(2 * k) 
            + 0.3 / k 
            + p.sin(y[i] / 25.0) * k * (9 + 4 * p.sin(9 * e - 3 * d + 2 * t));

      let px = q + 30 * p.cos(c) + 200;
      let py = 400 - (q * p.sin(c) + 39 * d - 220);

      p.point(px, py);
    }
    t += dt;
    if (t > p.TWO_PI) t = 0;
  };
});
</script>
